trends: There have been no other sightings in Mt Olive
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsBright light in western sky right at sunset approximately 3 fingers from horizon with fingers spread (method used to id. altitude while standing watches on Navy ships). Could have been a star or planet but, it dropped towards the horizon quickly. Color was bright white light similar to star. Color and size did not change. Object moved in one direction and constant speed toward horizon. Speed was barely detectable with naked eye. Used tree limbs as reference to detect movement.
